Text:
INNU RATHRI (FRIDAY DECEMBER 10, 2010) "VYUHAM" ENNU PARANJA RAGHUVARANTE CINEMA ACV-yil (TRIVANDRUM) UNDU...Faukka: ningalude ACV-yil ithu kaanikkunundenkil, ningal innu thanne ee comment vaayichenkil, TV tuner vechu record cheyyan shramikkuka...
(ee cinema vallappoozhume kaanikkoo)

[Well if you don't have a TV tuner card of your own or if it's difficult for your friend to record using their TV-Tuner card] PLEASE IGNORE THE ABOVE COMMENT

p. s. and continue uploading and seeding
have seen the film...YOU CAN IGNRE THE MESSAGES...BTW THANKS FOR HQ DIVX VERSION OF PUNYAM AHAM...
UPLOAD NEYTHUKARAN IF YOU HAVE, FAUKKA

Faukka : Please do upload any one of G. Aravindan movie if you have.
If you don't have, please upload Neythukaram, Mukhamukham.

If you happen to have P. N. Menon's 1972 Malayalam Movie Chembarathi, Please do upload that too. If you don't have that, please try uploading the above mentioned. I will seed your torrents from now on probably for a long time...I'm always seeding Swayamvaram. I've deleted that at once after seeing and a bit of seeding. Now I've copied that back and force re-checked it and made it active again, and I've continued my seeding of it.
